com.example.survivorbuddy4mobile

Class BuddyMessageServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.survivorbuddy4mobile.BuddyMessageServer

  • public class BuddyMessageServer
extends java.lang.Object
    A TCP server which receives packets of text encoded as UTF-8 and writes it to an PipedOutputStream

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuddyMessageServer

        public BuddyMessageServer(int port_num,
                          java.lang.String dc_message,
                          java.lang.Boolean restart_bool)
        Contructor for BuddyMessageServer
        Parameters:
        port_num - int, the port number used by the ServerSocket
        dc_message - String, the message which is sent to client upon server shutdown or that client sends to shutdown the server
        restart_bool - Boolean, true if server should be restarted upon shutdown. NOT IMPLEMENTED
